title: Her Boyfriend Left Her For Their Happily Married Co-Worker And Now Their Spreading Rumors
description:
Both her ex-boyfriend and the co-worker deny that they have anything going on and when she asked the co-worker about their relationship, she asked our listener if she and the guy were even a couple.
This entire situation is really updating our listeners, even more so because the two have been bullying and spreading rumors about her. She could possibly put this entire thing to a stop but she’s not sure if it’s what’s best. Should she tell the co-worker’s husband the truth?
